mapper.select: select meet_no, meet_name, meet_max_people, meet_info, meet_status, meet_img from meeting_room order by DECODE(meet_status, 'CP', 1, 'ST', 2), meet_no asc

select a.rev_no, a.meet_no, a.user_id, a.rev_start_time, a.rev_end_time, a.rev_people, a.rev_content, b.user_name, b.user_dept, b.user_job, c.dept_name, d.job_name from meet_reservation a join user_info b on a.user_id = b.user_id join dept c on b.user_dept = c.dept_no join job d on b.user_job = d.job_no where a.meet_no = #{meet_no}
select meet_no, user_id, rev_start_time, rev_end_time from meet_reservation where rev_start_time LIKE '%'||#{startDate}||'%' AND meet_no = #{meetNo}
select meet_no, meet_name, meet_max_people, meet_info, meet_img from meeting_room where meet_no = #{meet_no}

select a.rev_no, a.meet_no, a.user_id, a.rev_start_time, a.rev_end_time, a.rev_people, a.rev_content, b.user_name, b.user_dept, b.user_job, c.dept_name, d.job_name, e.meet_name from meet_reservation a join user_info b on a.user_id = b.user_id join dept c on b.user_dept = c.dept_no join job d on b.user_job = d.job_no join meeting_room e on a.meet_no = e.meet_no where a.user_id = #{user_id} order by rev_start_time asc
mapper.insert: insert into meet_reservation(rev_no, meet_no, user_id, rev_start_time, rev_end_time, rev_people, rev_content, rev_status) values(rev_seq.NEXTVAL, #{meet_no}, #{user_id}, #{rev_start_time}, #{rev_end_time}, 0, #{rev_content}, 0)
mapper.select:
select rn, a.rev_no, a.meet_no, a.user_id, a.rev_start_time, a.rev_end_time, a.rev_people, a.rev_content, b.user_name, b.user_dept, b.user_job, c.dept_name, d.job_name, e.meet_name from ( select rownum rn, a.rev_no, a.meet_no, a.user_id, a.rev_start_time, a.rev_end_time, a.rev_people, a.rev_content, b.user_name, b.user_dept, b.user_job, c.dept_name, d.job_name, e.meet_name from meet_reservation a
join user_info b on a.user_id = b.user_id
join dept c on b.user_dept = c.dept_no
join job d on b.user_job = d.job_no
join meeting_room e on a.meet_no = e.meet_no
where a.user_id = #{user_id} and rownum > 0) a
join user_info b on a.user_id = b.user_id
join dept c on b.user_dept = c.dept_no
join job d on b.user_job = d.job_no
join meeting_room e on a.meet_no = e.meet_no
where rn > #{skip} and rn <= #{viewSize} * #{pageNum}
order by rev_start_time asc
select count(rev_no) from meet_reservation where user_id = #{user_id}
